name: 260-23  berry blaze hat
notes:
**knitted hat / hipster hat for men in drops babymerino. piece is knitted bottom up in rib.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

#berryblazehat
drops design: pattern bm-125
yarn group a

----------------------------------------------------------

**size**:
s/m – l/xl
head circumference: approx. 54/56 - 58/61 cm

**yarn**:
drops baby merino from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
100-100 g colour 51, bordeaux

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 2.5 mm: length: 40 cm.
drops double pointed needles size 2.5 mm.
the technique magic loop can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm.

**knitting tension**:
26 stitches in width and 32 rows vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 2.5 mm = 10 x 10 cm.
remember: remember that needle size is only a suggestion. if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles.
